Two compendious discourses the one concerning the power of God, the other about the certainty and evidence of a future state : published in opposition to the growing atheism and deism of the age. Smith, Thomas, 1638-1710.
[4], 60 p.
Printed for S. Smith and B. Walford ..., London : 1699.
Dedicatory signed: Tho. Smith. Includes bibliographical references. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
